103011050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
103011050.baseFlair_: With this arrow I'll make the will of the lord known!
103011050.evoFlair_: Angelic arrows are truly miraculous! They bring revelation to the just and judgment to the wicked!

104011020.baseFlair_: Come at me! I'll hack you to bits right here! And I promise it'll hurt you more than it hurts me!
104011020.evoFlair_: I can't fall here—not with my family and allies counting on me! So come at me! The battlefield's mine!

105011020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied follower.
105011020.baseFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I am a heavenly angel, and I will bless your troops.
105011020.evoFlair_: Children of men who are heading into this just war. I shall help you see virtue through. I shall fight alongside you as a model warrior, and you will receive my blessings.

106011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the following effect - Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
106011010.baseFlair_: Bringing darkness wherever she goes, the night goddess hides the stars by painting the sky black. Those who embrace darkness give thanks to her so that they may become one with the pall. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 2
106011010.evoFlair_: Lovers of the pall know how to manage the darkness: let it paint over the senses and conceal one's true nature. The goddess looks on her adorable flock and smiles as she scatters the darkness amongst them. —The Night Goddess, Chapter 4

107011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower the ability to ignore Ward.
107011010.baseFlair_: Do you know the ingredients for adventure? Companions, knowledge, and tools? No silly! Just courage and a dream! Let's go!
107011010.evoFlair_: Embrace your dreams and muster your courage... For with courage, you can make your dreams come true! Now, now, there's no time to lose! I don't know where we're going, but it's sure to be an adventure!

107011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+1. Destroy an enemy amulet.
107011020.baseFlair_: Ga-ha-ha! You're a funny one! Maybe you should hang up your sword and take up comedy! Oh, that's actually your day job? Bwa-ha-ha! You really are a barrel of laughs!
107011020.evoFlair_: Some say I'm too easily amused. If you ask me, though, I say people don't laugh enough! I mean, even the battlefield can be hilarious—look at those serious faces... Bwa-ha-ha!

108011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly gain Ward or Rush.
108011010.baseFlair_: Let confusion get the better of you, human. The answer you seek is there inside the chaos. I found my answer on the other side of confusion—destruction, the only answer.
108011010.evoFlair_: Do not stand in awe, human. Confusion will in time engender an answer, the answer that confusion is a truth without parallel. Now take this chaos as your own.

109011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Elsam of the Brofamily into your hand.
109011020.baseFlair_: Sorry to keep you, like, salivating. Here's your grub with all the—whoa! That lady knight sitting over there... Total babe city!
109011020.evoFlair_: Guess I've got Katalina fever, you know? But I won't stop till I show her the way this heart beats. Kat, watch out! Cuz someday I'm gonna be your numero uno! Waaheey!

111011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If your leader's defense is less than your opponent's, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
111011010.baseFlair_:
Hey, pal. Never seen you 'round here before. You'd better move along though. Don't say I didn't warn ya.
—Kindhearted patron of the Skin of Your Teeth
111011010.evoFlair_:
Hey, buddy! Never seen you in here. Pull up a seat! Hey, barkeep! Give our new friend here the usual, an' make it extra spicy!
—Mean-spirited regular at the Skin of Your Teeth

114011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Natura cards from your deck into your hand.
114011010.baseFlair_: Contrast is what really makes flavors pop! Just think what a dash of salt does for your sweets! So even the nastiest food tastes better from the hands of a cute cook like me! If you know the right way to spin it, you can make anything easier to swallow!
114011010.evoFlair_: Contrast sharpens emotional impact too! Consider how much sweeter victory tastes when snatched from the jaws of defeat! So try eating something whose appearance absolutely terrifies you! The relief you feel will be better than any secret sauce!

116011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have any Machina or Natura cards in your hand, discard 1. Then put 2 random cards that share a trait with that card from your deck into your hand.
116011010.baseFlair_: Ah, heck yeah! Treasure! But you can't trick me, you silly, deadly labyrinth! You're hiding even greater riches deep in your tummy, aren't you?
116011010.evoFlair_: Whoa-ho-ho! The mother lode! They said that dungeon diving would be the end of me—well, look where my treasure tingle's gotten me now!

900011020.baseFlair_: Hurry! Her Royal Majesty is impatient. And if she loses her temper, you'll lose your head.
900011020.evoFlair_: Rebelling against Her Majesty? This won't end well for you. You're merely brazen, not brave.

900011030.baseFlair_: To keep Her Majesty safe is why I'm here. It's why I live.
900011030.evoFlair_: Her Majesty rules! So long as there's breath in my lungs, I'll allow none to touch her.

900011040.baseFlair_: My blade will punish any who disobey Her Majesty.
900011040.evoFlair_: Orders are orders, especially when they're coming from Her Majesty. Death to defiers of the queen!

900011050.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Tomoi of the Brofamily into your hand.
900011050.baseFlair_: Yo! I'm Elsam. It's, like, I'm so honored everybody could get together to share this grindage. As for my lady type... I've got a thing for fashionable girls. Here's to a rad evening, everyone!
900011050.evoFlair_: All right, you guys ready to begin the forty-fifth grand tourney of the primal beast name game? w00t! w00t!

900011060.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a Human! Pyramid! Attack! into your hand.
900011060.baseFlair_: Prime Minister Freesia... Nay, dearest Freezie. Just order me to protect you, and it's done!
900011060.evoFlair_: Freezie, stop... I'm still on duty... Zzz...

101021020.baseFlair_: Some monsters are rather more intelligent than others. Take the lizardmen, for example. These creatures fight for each other and for the survival of their species. Thinking they're just dumb reptiles would be disastrous.
101021020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon an unevolved Lizardman.
101021020.evoFlair_: You think you can negotiate with lizardmen just because they speak a few words of human language? Think again. Any information you give them is sure to be used against you one day.

103021040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put an Ultimate Carrot into your hand.
103021040.baseFlair_: For the finest chefs, only the finest ingredients will do! Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro!
103021040.evoFlair_: Everything in this world is just one more ingredient to me, including you tasty-looking morsels! Let's see if you can stand up to my most refined cooking technique! Firestorm of damnation!

106021020.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Draw a card.
106021020.baseFlair_: I don't do songs for the throngs. I only sing for one person. This song is your song. Now lend me your ears.
106021020.evoFlair_: My songs are great and heartfelt, because they're for one and one alone. Please listen as I sing.

107021020.baseFlair_: Whoa! Easy there, big guy! Eyes on the intruder only, got it?
107021020.evoFlair_: Yowza! S-settle down, buddy! I know you want 'em all for yourself, but don't get wild now!

112021020.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, evolve this follower.
112021020.baseFlair_: My brother-in-arms, he who possesses the Eye of Flame. Though he may cross established boundaries and commit taboos, upon sparking his true flame he is capable of reducing all creation to ash. —Grimnir, Warring Tempest
112021020.evoEffect_: Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy follower.
112021020.evoFlair_: Yeah, so this is my buddy Jafnhar! He doesn't really understand the concept of personal space, but he's got an amazing power in one of his eyes! How cool is that? —Grimnir, Warring Tempest

116021010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce all damage dealt to 0. (Applies to attacks and effects.)
116021010.baseFlair_: Songs spread peace and bring love to the furthest corners of the world. That's what a very famous singer taught me when I was just starting out. Anyway, here's a single from my upcoming album called Peace Sonata. Baby, it's love and peace...
116021010.evoFlair_:
Whoa, I love this song! Who wrote—Ah! It's mine, isn't it? Who knew it would catch on like this—love and peace, yeah!
—Apollo

100031010.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.
100031010.baseFlair_: I have no regrets. If I didn't burn Mother to death, Glass would have been killed!
100031010.evoEffect_:
Strike: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Glass to become Flame and Glass.
100031010.evoFlair_: Mother hated Glass and wanted to kill her, but I couldn't let that happen! I wanted to know Glass! She's a part of me after all. I had to protect her.

100031020.baseEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Flame to become Flame and Glass.
100031020.baseFlair_: I knew what I'd become. But I had to freeze Father, or he would have hurt Flame. I had no choice.
100031020.evoEffect_:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
At the start of your turn, this follower combines with an allied Harnessed Flame to become Flame and Glass.
100031020.evoFlair_: Father loved Flame—he only hated that she killed Mother. That's why I had to watch over Flame. I couldn't let her kill Father too.

104031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers 4 times.
104031020.baseFlair_: I am Grimnir, heaven's chosen god of war and the mad cyclone. I have descended from the lofty realm to save this world, but make no mistake... I'm not here to make friends.
104031020.evoFlair_: As my power grows, something within me whirls ever more madly. And few who see me unleash the cyclone will forget the sight of a mighty war god consumed by fury.

105031010.baseEffect_:
Can't attack.
When another allied follower attacks, this follower can attack until the start of your next turn.
105031010.baseFlair_: I spend my life here in this tower, braiding and unbraiding my hair. But if someone were only to come to me...
105031010.evoEffect_:
Can't attack.
When another allied follower attacks, this follower can attack until the start of your next turn.
105031010.evoFlair_: Here in this tower I'm lonely. No one comes to me but the songbirds. But if someone were only to take my hand, then I'd say good-bye to this tower.

107031020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Goblin, Goblin Leader, or Goblin Princess.
Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, give it Rush.
107031020.baseFlair_: There is no need for scheming or tactics, for violence is of the essence! Scream for vengeance, cry your fury—we will lay waste to the heavens!
107031020.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied follower that originally costs 1 play point or less comes into play, give it Rush.
107031020.evoFlair_: From the birds in the skies to the insects of the earth—we shall hunt, we shall feed! Our order shall rise and lay claim to every last corner of this world!

109031020.baseFlair_: Bahahaha! Laugh, celebrate, rejoice! For it is I, the supreme gourmet emperor, in the flesh! I have made my glorious return! Now then, shall I serve up a feast for the world?
109031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Nourishing Fare or Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand.
109031020.evoFlair_: There are two dishes on tonight's menu! Will you be embraced by sublime nourishment, be immersed in flaming-hot passion? Bahahaha! Don't be picky, just choose!

112031020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
112031020.baseFlair_:
"I brought you some tea, bro!"
"Oh, thanks! Did you spill it all on the way over or something? Oh well, it's the thought that counts!"
—Hnikar and Grimnir
112031020.evoFlair_:
"Let's get moving, Grimnir."
"Okay, okay! Haven't you ever heard of personal space?"
—Jafnhar and Grimnir

113031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an enemy follower is in play, change this follower's attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to the attack and defense of a random enemy follower.
113031020.baseFlair_:
"That's right. I'm a mirror into your soul."
"Oho! Such meaty thighs! Such tender flesh! Now this must be some world-class quality meat!"
"Qua... You tryin' to roast me?!"
—Hamsa and Khaiza
113031020.evoFlair_:
"Wow! Such gorgeous feathers! They'd make a fabulous accessory."
"Q-quaack! Don't even think about pluckin' these feathers!"
—Hamsa and Nelcha

115031020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put a follower with Fanfare (excluding Princess Knight) from your deck into your hand.
115031020.baseFlair_: He awoke with no memories, no powers of his own. But the bonds forged by his pure heart light his companions' path forward.
115031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Recover 1 play point. Subtract 2 from the Union Burst of all followers in your hand.
115031020.evoFlair_: He knows not why he is here—only what he has learned since awakening. But he bravely swings his sword for friendship, cutting through artifice to seek out a true ending.

900031020.baseFlair_: These wings have been blackened by the shadow of temptation. Corrupted by desire, I have fallen. But heavens, heed my call—for what purpose was I born this way, created this way?
900031020.evoFlair_: Where can one find sin? In those corrupted by temptation, or in a god who has created beings unable to triumph over its beckoning?

107041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Put a Morrigna's Gospel into your hand.
107041020.baseFlair_: The goddess mirrors battle; or rather, battle is a reflection of her will. In the fabric of hope and despair, fated glory and fierce adversity are woven together. —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 5
107041020.evoFlair_: War is merciful; war is ruthless. Fools are heralded as heroes, and heroes are forgotten in death. The path of your destiny rests upon the raven's feather—will you meet glory or death? —Trinity of Goddesses, Chapter 8

116041010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Use X play points to give +X/+X to this follower and another allied follower. X equals your remaining play points.
116041010.baseFlair_: Look up to the heavens and perk your ears. Judgment's trumpet will sound without timbre or tone. And, though wingless you might be, prophecy will be as your guidepost to the light.
116041010.evoFlair_: Bow your head and be enraptured. Divine words will shake the land without pretense or pulse. And, though powerless you might be, prophecy will be your offering to the darkness.

900041040.baseEffect_:
Clash: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
900041040.baseFlair_: I am the one who brightens the sky. My work is to deliver light to all the world. I'll even light the abyss of the underworld with an endless shimmer.
900041040.evoFlair_: You're seeking the blessings of the sky. So give your heart to the light. When it's shimmering brightest, I'll show you the wheel in the sky!

900041050.baseEffect_:
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Last Words: Put a Moon and Sun into your hand.
900041050.baseFlair_: I am the one who colors the earth; my work is to bring darkness on this plane. I'll even color the sky's shimmer with an unending darkness.
900041050.evoFlair_: You're wishing for the fall of the sky. So offer the darkness to your heart. When the clouds are darkest, the moon is sure to consume the earth.

900041110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
900041110.baseFlair_:
The seventh circle: Violence.
If you love not your fellows nor yourself then you deserve none in return.
900041110.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
900041110.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.
Our emperor, howling lion with jaws agape, is enthroned where all punishment originates. Where all sin expires.

101014020.baseFlair_: A melody of bravery that only the divine can play.

107014010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower that attacked last turn.
107014010.baseFlair_: Master trapsmiths may alter their contraptions depending on their prey. Alas, no need to fix what isn't broken.

101024020.baseFlair_: Loosed arrows become lights, piercing the hearts of evildoers one by one.

102024010.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 5 damage instead if it's evolved.
102024010.baseFlair_: Let's see if you're still standing after a taste of this.

110024010.baseEffect_: Give +4/+0 to a follower, then deal 4 damage to that follower.
110024010.baseFlair_: Know the pain of yearning. Abandon your innocence. I can't wait to see how you'll change.

116024010.baseEffect_:
Summon 2 Goblins.
Enhance (6): Summon 5 instead.
Enhance (9): Then evolve all unevolved allied Goblins.
116024010.baseFlair_:
First you reported that zombies were doing gymnastics, and now you say goblins are working together? What's next? Will pigs fly and bring happiness to the world?
—Sage Commander

114034010.baseEffect_:
Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
If you have more evolution points than your opponent, put a Flaming-Hot Fare into your hand. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
114034010.baseFlair_:
Let the cooking begin! Coctura integro! First a pinch of this, then a dash of that... And then... Unleash the flames! The oil's going to spatter, so spectators, stand back!
—Gourmet Emperor Khaiza

900034020.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 4 defense or less.

108044010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon an Amaterasu or Tsukuyomi.
Enhance (7): Give that follower +3/+3.
108044010.baseFlair_: The heavens house a blazing wheel; the dark night, a silver platter. The two differ as heaven and Hades, but both shine the same.

900044030.baseEffect_:
Give a random allied follower +3/+3.
Draw 3 cards.
Restore 3 defense to your leader.
900044030.baseFlair_:
"Rejoice!"
"Yield your courage!"
"The heavens have chosen thee!"
—The Prophecy of Morrigna

104013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Until this amulet leaves play, all followers in play and all followers that come into play have Ward.
104013010.baseFlair_: The war-weary pair devised a simpler way to settle their differences.

106013010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Add 3 to this amulet's Countdown.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
106013010.baseFlair_: From here the arrow was shot, soaring until it struck the shield waiting on the other side. The resultant trail is but one of the goddess's miracles. —A Lore of the Night Sky, Chapter 4

104022010.baseEffect_:
When you play a follower that originally costs at least 7 play points, destroy this amulet.
Last Words: Summon an Imperial Mammoth.
104022010.baseFlair_: What do you mean you heard an elephant? It was just your imagination! —An arctic explorer

115032010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 4 play points and there are no allied Colosseum on Highs in play, invoke this card.
Fanfare: If any other allied Colosseum on Highs are in play, draw 2 cards and destroy this amulet.
Until this amulet leaves play, both leaders have the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, give it +2/+2 and Rush.
115032010.baseFlair_: A colosseum borne on the back of a god. The strongest of the eight realms gather here to bask in the admiration of thousands. With entire worlds at stake, there is no holding back—the entire colosseum breathes in a single, fevered rhythm.

100011040.baseFlair_: Slowly the titan of a soldier approached. His every step was a mighty quake that sent rattles and groans through the buildings. The villagers could only watch in horror.
100011040.evoFlair_: Weapons, walls, pleas—nothing could halt his tempest of destruction. The village was reduced to rubble in a blink. The titanic soldier glanced down and then moved on in search of more prey.

101011020.baseFlair_: It's our duty to inspect this desert. We need to make sure it's safe before people start to cross it! Now come on—let's head out!
101011020.evoFlair_: The sun's relentless, and we're covered in sand, but we can't give up. The people are relying on us! Now come on—how about you and I lead the way?

105011030.baseEffect_: Summon a Goblin at the end of your turn.
105011030.baseFlair_: Let one get away and it'll call ten, and the ten will call a hundred. You have to squelch them all. —Lucius, Goblin Slayer
105011030.evoEffect_: Summon a Goblin at the end of your turn.
105011030.evoFlair_: Don't laugh at the little devils. They may not be wise, but they don't have limits. You've got to squash them all fast. Swordsweep! —Lucius, Goblin Slayer

109011010.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Deal 3 damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
109011010.baseFlair_: I've been blown up, torn down, and tossed around since I set out for the skies. But it was all worth it 'cuz they helped me get the Grandcypher flying again. Aaand that's why I'll never stay grounded.
109011010.evoFlair_: Yeah, me and the Grandcypher'll get you where you're goin'. So buckle up! Next stop: the end of the sky!

111011020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Keen Enchantment into your hand.
111011020.baseFlair_: I am the proof of an unyielding heart! Don't worry about nicks or cracks in your blade! My powers will have it good as new in no time! Sharp enough to slice through anything!
111011020.evoFlair_: I'm living proof of what an unflagging fighting spirit can do! Your blade may crack or even break, but with me by your side, never fear! Your sword will always be sharp enough to slice through anything!

112011010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
112011010.baseFlair_: OMG! You seem, like, totally bummed! Guess it's my time to shine! Come on, let's get hyped up!
112011010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
112011010.evoFlair_:
"You could learn a lot from her."
"I have! Just listen—OMG!"
"That's not what I meant..."
—Lyrial and Ephemera

113011020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
Enhance (10): Gain +4/+4 more.
113011020.baseFlair_: A thriving metropolis stands atop what was once a mere mountain of rubble. A single step—the goliath revealed himself before the land.
113011020.evoFlair_: A mere mountain of rubble rests where once stood a thriving metropolis. A single step—the goliath concealed himself within the land.

115011010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are no allied Naterran Great Trees in play, summon a Naterran Great Tree. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain +2/+2 instead.
115011010.baseFlair_: Sheepies are so fluffy! Baskin' in the warm sunshine, munchin' on oh-so-tasty grass... Those precious children of the land grow up so fast!
115011010.evoFlair_: Ridin' a sheep's like floatin' on a cloud! "Clip-clop" go their little hooves, "Baa, baa" go their little voices... Those gentle children of the land are always smilin'!

117011020.baseFlair_: You know that warm feeling you get when you think back on a letter? That's your heart sprouting wings so that it can send back a reply. If you could spare a thought for me too, well... that would make my day!
117011020.evoFlair_: Every letter is written with emotion and sealed with shared memories. And each one nestles in your heart, giving it wings. Being a courier is so rewarding! I can't think of a more heartwarming job!

102021030.baseFlair_: These duds are slick! Huh? You're looking mighty hungry...
102021030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all followers.
102021030.evoFlair_: Ha-ha! Look who's laughing now. Have a taste of my searing light, pal!

104021040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +2/+2 if you have at least 20 Neutral cards remaining in your deck.
104021040.baseFlair_: Though it's not evil, it's not partial to good. Thus is the nature of the wise strix. It longs only for a world where the balance is preserved.
104021040.evoFlair_: The far-sighted strix sees beyond all good and evil in this world. When its beak breaks the silence, the balance of the world will be restored.

101031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy a follower, and then put a copy of that follower into play.
101031010.baseFlair_: The past cannot be changed, and destiny cannot be altered. Everything has been set in stone. Still, you must not forget: miracles are only visited upon those who overcome this divine providence.
101031010.evoFlair_: I shall use my powers to free the future from the yoke of destiny. Do not become a prisoner of despair, for a hopeful future can be yours—a future of freedom. Go ahead and grasp it.

103031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
103031010.baseFlair_: The divine flame only grants an audience to the chosen. Burning with the radiance of dawn, the holy presence grants salvation to those it favors.
103031010.evoFlair_: Clad in sacred flames, the angel of divine light brought a corona of golden hope to the gloomy world. Soon sunlight was restored to the heavens, marking the beginning of a new world order.

103031020.baseFlair_: Can you buy me a little more time? Just until I finish chanting my inferno spell... If you can hold back the enemy, I'll help you turn the tables!
103031020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 5 damage instead if it's a Neutral follower.
103031020.evoFlair_: Minions of darkness! My unrivaled flames will purge your rotten souls and restore your purity!

107031010.baseFlair_: Ding-dong, ding-dong! Hey, check it out! Everybody's wishes gave these bells a new life! Now the sounds of joy are sure to reach you!
107031010.evoFlair_:
Everybody's wishes, I want them all to come true!
So wish for happiness, and the bells of joy will keep on ringing! Ding-dong, ding-dong!

108031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Ruthful Droplet or Ruthless Waterspout into your hand.
108031030.baseFlair_: The ocean's big and open, so you can do anything! The gentle currents, the raging waves—which do you like?
108031030.evoFlair_: The ocean's big and open, and my heart is too! So yeah, yeah, don't do anything too bad! I won't forgive you just like that!

110031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.
110031010.baseFlair_:
"C'mon, Goblin Mage! We've got treasure to hunt!"
"Ooh! Feena, I found some shiny stuff!"
"Wait, don't touch that! It's a tr—"
—Feena and Goblin Mage, falling for an obvious trap
110031010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy all enemy followers that cost 1 play point or less.
110031010.evoFlair_:
"F-failure? Ha! I don't know the meaning of the word!"
"Ah! There's something shiny on the floor! Yoink!"
"Did you hear a click just now?"
—Feena and Goblin Mage, about to fall into an oubliette

110031030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Until the end of the opponent's turn, give all allies the following effect - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
110031030.baseFlair_: A grudge against you? Why would I feel anything at all about someone I've never met? This is just part of the job. So stop struggling, okay? You're making it harder to smite you!
110031030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 2 damage to an enemy.

—Terrifying Giants, folk song

106021030.evoFlair_:
But killin' a giant takes
guts, glory,

110021010.evoFlair_: The martial artist's path leads to knowledge: knowledge of the body, its workings, and its weaknesses. But wisdom is a fragile, flighty thing, liable to desert us in moments of mortal peril.

111021010.evoFlair_: Really, we never should have met. That's why we'll have to part someday. It's a lonely thought... but I'm not scared. You're on an amazing journey and I'm excited for you!

104031010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied follower that has attacked this turn and is no longer able to attack. Fully restore its defense and the ability to attack.
104031010.baseFlair_: With this harp granted to me by the gods, I'll play a song of blessings. I'm sure my heartwarming melodies will bring peace to you as well.
104031010.evoFlair_: As the chosen harpist of the gods, I'll bring the melodies of paradise to those who suffer. Though the notes are still but a whisper, I believe they'll reach every corner of this world in time.

111031020.evoEffect_:
Ward.

116031020.baseFlair_:
Add a little gas and the spark becomes flame. So what happens when you punch up the flame?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry
116031020.evoFlair_:
Agitate the fire enough and you've got a hefty boom on your hands. So what happens when you punch up that boom?
—Cheeky Demon's Inquiry

101041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +4/+3 to an allied follower.
101041010.baseFlair_: One of the four mighty archangels who serve as divine messengers. Gabriel's benevolent smile will lead humanity to ever greater heights.
101041010.evoFlair_: The archangel Gabriel's soul is as pure and white as her wings. As a divine representative, she presents the chosen one with new power in the form of a legendary sword.

103041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Neutral follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush, and return it to your hand at the end of your turn.
103041020.baseFlair_: The delicate angel reigns over the sky. Though she may look innocent, her unholy rivals quiver when she launches a flurry of light-beam arrows from her star staff.
103041020.evoFlair_: “Attack,” whispers the pure angel. A troop of valkyries fills the sky at her command and descends to drive away the wicked.

106041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a follower that originally costs 7 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it. Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the attack of that follower.
106041020.baseFlair_: Stars do more than sit in their heavenly thrones and shine. Part of our might lies in descending to the earth and rending it. You beings with bellies on the ground, I implore you to swear your allegiance to me.
106041020.evoFlair_: Stars don't always guide their observers to brilliant futures. No, death, despair, fear—these are their true predictions. You beings who pray to the heavens, offer your fear to the light.

108041010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects.
-Followers can't be played.
-Whenever you play a spell, draw a card.
-Whenever you play an amulet, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
(These effects last until this follower leaves play.)
108041010.baseFlair_: Is it a god, or it is a demon? Nay, it is neither, and it cannot be compared to any other being. It is the origin, and it is the end. That which begins the world, and that which ends it.
108041010.evoFlair_: That which differs from all else in the world. That which transcends all else in the world. Great gods and dread demons bow their heads before it.

110041020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Drain.
Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to all other allied followers.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
110041020.baseFlair_: Greetings, you adorable little soul. The world just laughs so innocently—makes me want to gobble it all up. When boys finally learn the bitterness inherent in yearning, that's when they ripen into men. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?
110041020.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Drain.
At the start of your turn, if this is your tenth turn or later, both players draw 5 cards.
110041020.evoFlair_: This passion is lovely, don't you think? Hurry and swallow it, just as your yearning commands. No one will ever touch you again; that privilege will belong only to me. Oh! Shall I put the world to the same trial?

111041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Basic cards from the enemy leader's class into your hand and subtract 3 from their costs.
111041020.baseFlair_:
Realign reality. Alter the axiom, and converge a realm anew.
Realize the inconceivable, and alter destiny.
For once upon a time, man could only gaze up at the earth. —Opening lines from The Almanack
111041020.evoFlair_:
Hell loomed above the heavens, for the heavens lay at the ends of the earth.
We trod the clouds, we floated through the sky.
That has changed everything.
—Final lines from The Almanack

112041020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Invocation: At the start of your tenth turn or later, if at least 6 allied followers have evolved this match, invoke this card.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
112041020.baseFlair_: Ragnarok approaches from the depths of time. The einherjar summoned by the heavenly maidens thirst for battle. The divine warlord climbs astride Sleipnir, his trusted steed, and makes for the land of destiny, the ferocious clatter of hooves echoing in his wake.
112041020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.
112041020.evoFlair_: Huginn reads the thoughts of the world, while Muninn perceives the memories of the world. Within the twilight, these two great birds deliver news of an unavoidable fate. Still the divine warlord chooses to descend upon the battlefield to face his enemies.

115041010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give all other allies the following effect - The next time this ally takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
115041010.baseFlair_: Time flows onward, but battle is a constant. We meet again, dauntless warrior. Once again, I shall shield you from defeat and the suffering that besieges you!
115041010.evoFlair_: A goddess of battle and a goddess of the shield. Someday I'd like to test which is stronger—her protection or my barrier. —Godsworn Alexiel

Fusion: Machina or Natura
----------
Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Put X random Machina or Natura cards from your deck into your hand. If this card is fused with a Machina and Natura card, subtract 3 from their costs. X equals the number of cards fused to this card.
116041020.baseFlair_: The world is dead and metal. Nature is lush and fertile. The soul of steel; the frame of a flower. Worlds apart, yet worlds collided. The Omnipotence forces this mergence and births inescapable battle.
116041020.evoFlair_: The mechanical yearns for progress; the natural yearns for propagation. Confrontation is inevitable. Hostility, unavoidable. No victors will walk away from the conflict, save perhaps for the very Omnipotence who designed it.

900041030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Deal 7 damage to all enemies.
900041030.baseFlair_: We are two, and we are one. May we never be separated again. May this world—riven into gods and demons—be united again.
900041030.evoEffect_:
Storm.

900041030.evoFlair_: The world is full of contradictions. Destruction and rebirth. Desire and despair. Love and hate. I am a mixture of all these things, given form in the present. Now, would you like to be burned? Or frozen? Or both?

106011030.baseFlair_: "What's makin' me legs tremble?" grumbled the veteran soldier. "Well, it ain't 'cause I'm lily-livered. Just the earth rattlin', s'all."

117011010.evoFlair_: Just look at that piercing action, folks! One shot will banish even the most stubborn demons!

101021030.baseFlair_: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. His strength was irresistible, and he held dominion over the entire world.
101021030.evoFlair_: The demigod-king Gilgamesh was in some ways more powerful than the gods themselves. Desperate to overcome death, he descended to the underworld in search of the secret of immortality.

102031020.baseFlair_: If you seek new heights, I can help. Embrace my power, and become who you were meant to be!
102031020.evoEffect_:

104031030.evoFlair_: A raging force of nature and a razor-fanged disaster. None remain who can stop this fearsome beast. When it brings down its fist, countries, continents, and even worlds perish.

101041020.evoFlair_: I have acted against God. Banishment to an endless void awaits. Ha! Haughty gods, prepare yourselves for destruction and despair. My rebellion starts now!

102041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
102041020.baseFlair_: Odin, the greatest of the gods, presided over matters of battle. From his lofty palace in Asgard, he sought to conquer the world.
102041020.evoFlair_: As the twilight begins to fall for the gods, their one-eyed father fought in the battle at Vigrid, clad in jet black armor and armed with a peerless spear.

107041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give both leaders the following effect - At the end of your turn, draw cards equal to the attack of the strongest allied follower in play. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
107041010.baseFlair_: A divine will, penetrating the spiral of time—his celestial inscription is universal and eternal. The sun sets, and rises to the dawn of a new life, and a new age.
107041010.evoFlair_: Time begets destruction and rebirth. Eternal peace is but a memory lost within the flow of its eternal passage. Pursue not what has been lost in its ravages, but embrace the current.

113041010.baseFlair_: A fate determined by the gods—no different than the sealing of hope. No time to wait, only to push forward. Gods above, you may think my ambition to be nothing short of senseless. But I won't stop. Not until the very end, not until my final moment!
113041010.evoEffect_: Once on each of your turns, when you play another follower, give it the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
113041010.evoFlair_: Locked away beyond the gate, hope awaits us. Until we reach the new world, my wings will never stop. Those who seek to hinder my ambition, prepare yourselves. This magic blade rends all creation!

Ward.

Those that have traversed the righteous order of the world will be burnt to ash.
900041090.evoFlair_:
The ninth circle: Cocytus.

900011070.baseFlair_:

102041010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Increase your evolution points to 3.
102041010.baseFlair_: I welcome you, my new brethren in a world of chaos! Our clan's victories on the battlefield will surely be a blow to the gods.
102041010.evoFlair_: Today, my new brethren, we embark on a journey that will start with bloodshed but will one day lead us to a new world!

104041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
104041020.baseFlair_: The task of deciding whether to pass judgment was entrusted to the most sorrowful angel of them all. To ease the suffering of those who walk the earth, she played her melodies and sang of her sorrow.
104041020.evoEffect_: Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
104041020.evoFlair_: She could never eliminate all the suffering no matter how hard she tried, and she finally passed her judgment in despair. Her tears fell even as she cleaved through the sinful.

109041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (7): Deal 3 damage to all followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
----------
At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109041010.baseFlair_: Summoned by an earnest plea, the dragon breaks its shackles. Its cry resonates across the sky and strikes awe into the hearts of all who hear it.
109041010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all other followers. Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
109041010.evoFlair_: Answering the call of the blue-haired girl, this dark dragon takes flight to confront a grave threat to all life. Unshackled at long last, its magnificent roar rattles the heavens.

111041010.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (3): Randomly put 4 different Cocytus cards into your deck.
----------
Fanfare: Replace your deck with a Cocytus Deck.
111041010.baseFlair_: The Heavens fall to Earth. Earth plunges into Hell. Cocytus swallows all, robbing Creation of breath and entombing it in ice. Conqueror. Serpent. Father of Lies. Being with faces innumerable—none of them true. The only certainty is this: He is the world's adversary.
111041010.evoFlair_: Part your lips to speak: Ice will take your throat, twine through your entrails. Be silent: Ice will seal your lips eternally. Blades shall rust away. Knowledge burn to cinders. Life shall be Cocytus's shivering prisoner. The only option is this: To cast this world aside.

115041020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers except a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Then, if at least 4 followers have been destroyed this turn, summon an Imperial Mammoth.
115041020.baseFlair_: Every hundred years, the towering mammoth god gathers the strongest fighters from every realm and holds a tournament. To enter, one must possess the eight essential wills. Competitors flock to the colosseum, each for their own reason.
115041020.evoFlair_: Every hundred years, the mammoth god's trumpeting opens wide the gates to other worlds. Victors shall rule. Losers shall serve. The clash of desires in the colosseum shall be offered up to the god.

101041030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Replace your deck with an Apocalypse Deck.
101041030.baseFlair_: The would-be usurper of Heaven, cast into the pits of Hell, has risen again in a cloak of flame. Soon this underworld king shall spark an apocalypse that paints all mortals and gods in blood.
101041030.evoFlair_: The king of the underworld and his gathered armies of darkness reveled in the coming of the day of revelation. Chaos and destruction tore through the world in a dance of madness, staining all in despair.

103041010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy all other followers.
Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
103041010.baseFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. The beauty of its deep black frame overwhelms all else in creation.
103041010.evoEffect_: Can't attack the enemy leader if 2 or more enemy followers are in play.
103041010.evoFlair_: The supreme dragon, standing with the gods themselves. Unsurpassed are its divine powers, and heroes dream often of its glory.

104041010.baseFlair_: The omnipotent being who in time reigned supreme over the other gods. He was born to a goddess and rebelled against his divine father.
104041010.evoFlair_: Clad in the armor of fear and wielding a radiant lightning spear, the almighty sky father illuminated the sky of dawn.

105041020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 20 from the cost of a Neutral card (excluding Queen of the Dread Sea) and a non-Neutral card in your hand. Then discard all other cards in your hand.
105041020.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself, and vow your loyalty to me. You'll no longer thirst for what you wish for. Tell me your wishes, and then drink down mine.
105041020.evoFlair_: Where go your wishes? Your fragile dreams? Do they sink like a stone into the abyss, or do they rise like bubbles to the surface? Your actions determine all.

113041020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly activate 1 of the following effects. Do this X times. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
-Restore 5 defense to your leader.
-Gain +3/+0 and the ability to ignore Ward.
-Gain +2/+1 and Storm.
-Gain +1/+2 and Bane.
-Gain +0/+3 and Ward.
113041020.baseFlair_: A blade of lightning rests in his grip. The same flash that would make the night sky tremble—it punishes the darkness and descends upon the land. When the threads of fate entwine at last, the final battle against the lord of purgatory shall begin.
113041020.evoFlair_: The adamantine scythe destroys all that it touches; the aegis shield defends all from destruction. When the gods supreme take to arms, the world trembles.

900044020.baseEffect_: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 1.
900044020.baseFlair_: Your fate's reached the end of its thread.
